title: Sportscast - October 18, 2015
text:
Sports » CBS 2 Local Sports » Sportscast - October 18, 2015 CBS 2 Local Sports 
Updated: Mon, Oct 19 2015, 12:08 AM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 News at 10 on October 18, 2015. Related Stories Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires 
LAMAR ODOM - TRACING HIS STEPS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- He's been in a hospital since Tuesday, as doctors try to save his life. Business News 
Stocks seek direction 
NEW YORK (AP) -- Major U.S. stock indexes have been hovering between small gains and losses as investors assess the latest company earnings. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: DAILY FANTASY SPORTS SHUT DOWN BY NEVADA REGULATORS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- Nevada officials are ordering daily fantasy sports sites like DraftKings and FanDuel to shut down -- saying the sites can't operate without a gambling license.
